Articles.Content: The private beta has been released and I plan on getting a developer account withing 2 days, so that's good.
It will probably run like molasses on a winter's day on my iPhone 4S, so I'll be sticking with jailbroken iOS 7.

They announced that it will improve significantly performance on old phones, they doing this because of the market in china and other low GDP countries where they still selling great amounts of old iPhones.

> 
> It will probably run like molasses on a winter's day on my iPhone 4S, so I'll be sticking with jailbroken iOS 7.

Testers reported better performance specifically on iPhone 4s with iOS 9.
